Welcome

          Description

Packages
com.kinvey The main package where you can find the client and the main public interfaces for the java library.
com.kinvey.analytics Here you will find the classes related to tracking and analytics.
com.kinvey.exception Containing all of the exception classes for the library.
com.kinvey.persistence Base classes handling persistence.
com.kinvey.persistence.mapping Classes that handle the marshalling from JSON to Native Java objects.
com.kinvey.persistence.query To make use of the more advanced querying mechanisms.
com.kinvey.push Push API integration with Urban Airship libraries.
com.kinvey.util Utilities package used primarily for internal use.

 

Welcome

Thanks for using Kinvey to build your backend. You can use these API docs to discover the ins and outs of the Kinvey Android library.

Overview

Kinvey provides a robust backend for your mobile apps by providing features that enable you to build amazing apps without worrying about your backend. Currently Kinvey provides the following services:
  • appdata A query-able key/value (and more) data storage platform for your app
  • Users Keep track of users of your application and control access to data on a user-by-user basis
  • Resources A storage system for your media content (images, videos, files, etc.) that provides out of the box Content Distribution Network (CDN) capabilities.
  • Push Notifications Our partnership with Urban Airship gives you awesome push features without the headache of managing them yourself.
For more details on how to use these features read the Kinvey Service Overview.

Other Documentation

  • For an overview of the service, see the Kinvey Service Overview.
  • For a quickstart, see the Android Quickstart Tutorial.
  • For a more detail, see the Android Developer's Guide.
  • For other libraries, behind-the-scenes REST action and useful articles, see the Kinvey Documentation Overview.
  • If you prefer a Sample Application check Kinvey's GitHub for our samples.
